skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

effects.description: Mount: Warshrine

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: Manticores are highly prized by Sorcerers, for they are creatures bathed in magic and as cruel as their riders.

effects.description: Mount: Manticore

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos Dragons were once noble rulers of the skies, now split and corrupted by the forces of Change.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Dragon

skillTree.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers tighten their grip on the land, as dark sorcery paves the way for their fell influence.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Undivided Authority: +2
	(Lord's army)

Khorne Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Undivided Authority: +3
	(Lord's army)

Khorne Authority: -2
	(Lord's army)

Undivided Authority: +4
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic and Chaos are eternally intertwined in a symbiotic storm of malevolent power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(Lord's army)

Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic need not only wreak havoc at range—half the fun of battle, after all, is seeing the fear in your enemy's eyes.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +7

skillTree.localised_description: The Forsaken heed the commands of the powerful, and thrive on the excess of their energy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Forsaken, Chaos Spawn and Chaos Feral Manticore units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Forsaken
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kill, crush, destroy—these are the tenets of Chaos!

effects.description: Armour: +15
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.localised_description: Pain is a trivial price to pay in assuring the complete annihilation of Order!

effects.description:
Undivided Authority: +1
	(Lord's army)
Physical resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The brand of the Ruinous Powers is seared into the skin, a mark of absolute dedication to the cause of corruption.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Paragon of Ruin"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)
Souls gained from battles: +10%

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

Undivided Authority: +1
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

effects.description: Enables flaming attacks
Fire resistance: 50%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A Chaos Familiar memorises spells on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.

effects.description: Cooldown: -5% to all spells

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25%
Charge bonus: +35

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25%

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

effects.description:
Control: -8
	(local enemy province)
Attribute: Causes Fear

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.

effects.description: Armour: +25

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description: Character experience gain: +15%
